modName: Fondunado and more for PcGamer from Softlight
summary:
This short \"mod\" I made for PcGamer, couse his FONDUNADO time is so awesome.
Feel free to use this.
descriptionHtml:
1 Move all files in your skyrim main dir (example: C:\\Program Files\\Skyrim)
2 Start Skyrim and load a savegame
3 When loading is done, press ` (tilde) to open console
4 Write: bat fondunado (or other of 3 files name)
5 Press enter. Done.
author: Softlight
